basics.name: Lowe Schmidt
basics.label: Systems Administrator
basics.summary: Lowe is dedicated and pragmatic operations engineer, a love for computers that turned into an interest in free and open source software and UNIX culture carved the path to a career in IT Operations.

work.summary: As a Consultant for Init I have worked with customers in the multimedia broadcasting business, startups in the telecom sphere and online gaming sites.
highlights: Designed and implemented a complete infrastructure including provisioning, configuration management, ad-hoc command execution, monitoring, metrics collection and log aggregation. Custom Puppet module development for automating application server installs. Enabled us to spin up new environments on the vSphere based cluster in less than one hour.

work.summary: Systems administration and infrastructure design for the banks web platform based on RHEL/Solaris, Tomcat, Gigaspaces, Oracle and MongoDB.
highlights: Refactored our complete Puppet code base to follow the language style guides
Educated coworkers in idiomatic Puppet and performed code reviews

work.summary: System Administrator for a digital media distribution company, doing web and storage operations.
Systems administration and operations design for an ad serving and real time bidding company for online banners and commercials
highlights: Took part in designing and implementing a new data center, including physical planning, rack and stack, physical and logical network design and routing
Introduced and implemented automated provisioning of new machies using The Foreman, including OS installations, DNS reservation and registration of machines in Chef

volunteer.summary: Global movement of free coding clubs for young people.
